quote: Women show men beauty in things beyond their ambitions. Women tell men to stop and smell the roses.
author: Criss Jami,  Diotima, Battery, Electric Personality

quote: There are women who make things better... simply by showing up. There are women who make things happen. There are women who make their way. There are women who make a difference. And women who make us smile. There are women of wit and wisdom who- through strength and courage- make it through. There are women who change the world everyday... Women like you.
author: Ashley Rice

quote: Battered Women [5w] Battered womenare more crispy.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Why are women... so much more interesting to men than men are to women?
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Woman is the light of God.
author: Rumi

quote: Women love always: when earth slips from them, they take refuge in heaven.
author: George Sand

quote: Feminism is the radical notion that women are human beings.
author: Cheris Kramarae

quote: In love, women are professionals, men are amateurs
author: François Truffaut

quote: All the problem of women, starts with men. All the problem of men, ends with women.
author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday

quote: There's two kinds of women--those you write poems about and those you don't.
author: Jeffrey McDaniel

quote: Crying is for plain women. Pretty women go shopping.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: In the realm of love and sex, it’s girls who are in the position of working hard to adapt themselves to the needs and fantasies of the mercurial males whose approval and attention they seek.
author: Meenakshi Gigi Durham,  The Lolita Effect: The Media Sexualization of Young Girls and What We Can Do About It

quote: Women don't want all that. Women just want a partner who is considerate and attentive, who will spoon with them while reciting Keats, and feed them organic yogurt by candlelight on a seaside cliff at sunset.
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: Women want love to be a novel, men a short story.
author: Daphne du Maurier

quote: Men die in battle; women die in childbirth.
author: Philippa Gregory,  The Red Queen

quote: Women are meant to be loved, not to be understood.
author: Oscar Wilde,  Lord Arthur Savile's Crime and Other Stories

quote: You are one woman in an endless line of women who were chosen to love more passionately than others, be committed to justice more fervently than others, and seek our Maker’s higher expressions more reflectively than others.
author: Mandy Nachampassack-Maloney,  Autumnal Dancer

quote: Women want love to be a novel. Men, a short story.
author: Daphne du Maurier

quote: Let men be men and let women be women and the world will revolve around its purpose
author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

quote: From sixteen to twenty, all women, kept in humor by their hopes and by their attractions, appear to be good-natured.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: Women who seek to be equal with men lack ambition.
author: Timothy Leary

quote: Women, as they grow older, rely more and more on cosmetics. Men, as they grow older, rely more and more on a sense of humor.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: Women may fall when there's no strength in men.Act II
author: William Shakespeare,  Romeo and Juliet

quote: When you reduce a woman to writing, she makes you think of a thousand other women
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Woman is a delicate creature with strong emotions who has been created by the Almighty God to shoulder responsibility for educating society and moving toward perfection. God created woman as symbol of His own beauty and to give solace to her partner and her family.
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: Women united can create movements. We can empower entire generations. We can build peace one action at a time. Together we rise. The time is now.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Basically, all women are nurturers and healers, and all men are mental patients to varying degrees.
author: Nelson DeMille,  The General's Daughter

quote: We’re never gonna understand women. They’re way too complex. You’ve got too many variables to consider. PMS, bad hair days, miscellaneous mood swings . . . there’s no way to tell what’s causing their attitude. - Mike
author: Susane Colasanti,  When It Happens

quote: Straight Men vs. Curved Women [10w] 'Straight' men who approach 'curved' women must'mind the gap'.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Women are our most miraculous muse, an enchanted intangibility that encourages all art.
author: CeeLo Green

quote: Women with low self-esteem love bad boys. Women who have work to do love bad boys. Women who love themselves love good men.
author: Tracy McMillan

quote: Women are tenacious, and all of them should be tenacious of respect; without esteem they cannot exist; esteem is the first demand that they make of love.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: No, women like you don't write. They carve onion sculptures and potato statues. They sit in dark corners and braid their hair in new shapes and twists in order to control the stiffness, the unruliness, the rebelliousness.
author: Edwidge Danticat,  Krik? Krak!

quote: Men may be stronger, but it is women who endure.
author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Princess

quote: It's an amusing idea to some, this feminism thing - this audacious notion that women should be able to move through the world as freely, and enjoy the same inalienable rights and bodily autonomy, as men. At least, that's the impression given when feminism and feminists are all too often the targets of lazy humor.
author: Roxane Gay

quote: Women respond to comfort and a sense of humor. I was always able to make them laugh, so that helps a lot.
author: Peter Dinklage

quote: You know that look that women get when they want to have sex? Me neither.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Men are from Earth, women are from Earth. Deal with it.
author: George Carlin

quote: Women who focus on style over substance usually find themselves in a big fucking hole, with other men who want to fuck the hole. Oh so smooth, and none sophistacted. Because, you know, how sophisticated can hole-fucking really be
author: Emilie Autumn

quote: A busy, vibrant, goal-oriented woman is so much more attractive than a woman who waits around for a man to validate her existence.
author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: The more women sit down and write something in a woman's voice for a woman, they more you'll see women in comedy because gender doesn't define sense of humor. Imagination and intelligence and perspective do.
author: Kristen Schaal

quote: What would men be without women? Scarce, sir...mighty scarce.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Women were different, no doubt about it. Men broke so much more quickly. Grief didn't break women. Instead it wore them down, it hollowed them out very slowly.
author: Cornelia Funke,  Inkdeath

quote: Women cannot complain about men anymore until they start getting better taste in them.
author: Bill Maher

quote: The manlier you are, the harder it is to understand what a woman wants: there is not a hint of female brain in you.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: A woman may be beautiful but have poor character. A man may be a business genius, making money left and right, but lack common courtesy, sensitivity, and compassion.
author: Myles Munroe,  Waiting and Dating

quote: I myself have never been able to find out precisely what feminism is: I only know that people call me a feminist whenever I express sentiments that differentiate me from a doormat.
author: Rebecca West

quote: Women writers make for rewarding (and efficient) lovers. They are clever liars to fathers and husbands; yet they never hold their tongues too long, nor keep ardent typing fingers still.
author: Roman Payne,  Rooftop Soliloquy

quote: Do feminists have a sense of humor? Yes.
author: Gloria Allred

quote: A woman laughing is a woman conquered.
author: Napoléon Bonaparte,  In the Words of Napoleon: A Collection of Quotations of Napoleon Bonaparte
